name: cphssphl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn)), wcel(c3, chl))
bodyPretty: ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ Ban)→ c3 ∈ CHil)

stmt.origin: sylanbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn)), wcel(c3, chl), wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c3, ccph))
stmt.pretty: sylanbrc((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ Ban), c3 ∈ CHil, c3 ∈ Ban, c3 ∈ CPreHil)

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn)), wcel(c3, chl))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn)), wcel(c3, cbn))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn)), wcel(c3, ccph))
-| wb(wcel(c3, chl), wa(wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c3, ccph)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ Ban)→ c3 ∈ CHil)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ Ban)→ c3 ∈ Ban)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ Ban)→ c3 ∈ CPreHil)
⊣ (c3 ∈ CHil ↔(c3 ∈ Ban ∧ c3 ∈ CPreHil))

-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn)), wcel(c3, cbn))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn)), wcel(c3, ccph))
-| wb(wcel(c3, chl), wa(wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c3, ccph)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ Ban)→ c3 ∈ CHil)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ Ban)→ c3 ∈ Ban)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ Ban)→ c3 ∈ CPreHil)
⊣ (c3 ∈ CHil ↔(c3 ∈ Ban ∧ c3 ∈ CPreHil))

stmt.origin: simp3(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn))
stmt.pretty: simp3(c0 ∈ CPreHil, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ Ban)

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn)), wcel(c3, cbn))
body.pretty: ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ Ban)→ c3 ∈ Ban)

|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn)), wcel(c3, chl))

stmt.origin: 3adant3(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c3, ccph))
stmt.pretty: 3adant3(c0 ∈ CPreHil, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ Ban, c3 ∈ CPreHil)

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn)), wcel(c3, ccph))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, ccph))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ Ban)→ c3 ∈ CPreHil)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ CPreHil)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn)), wcel(c3, chl))
-| wb(wcel(c3, chl), wa(wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c3, ccph)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, ccph))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ Ban)→ c3 ∈ CHil)
⊣ (c3 ∈ CHil ↔(c3 ∈ Ban ∧ c3 ∈ CPreHil))
⊣ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ CPreHil)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, ccph))
-| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ CPreHil)
⊣ c3 =(c0[|`s]c1)
⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn)), wcel(c3, chl))
-| wb(wcel(c3, chl), wa(wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c3, ccph)))
-| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ Ban)→ c3 ∈ CHil)
⊣ (c3 ∈ CHil ↔(c3 ∈ Ban ∧ c3 ∈ CPreHil))
⊣ c3 =(c0[|`s]c1)
⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c3, chl), wa(wcel(c3, cbn), wcel(c3, ccph)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cbn)), wcel(c3, chl))
-| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ Ban)→ c3 ∈ CHil)
⊣ c3 =(c0[|`s]c1)
⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)

comment: A Banach subspace of a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is a subcomplex Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 11-Apr-2008.) (Revised by AV, 25-Sep-2022.)
